project.name: J-C774A-CMUD-09-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF04-01
project.description: This test takes in integer n. The program attempts to open n files. If n is large enough the number of file handles will be exhausted.

iopair.name: J-C774A-CMUD-09-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF04-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: J-C774A-CMUD-09-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF04-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

if [[ -f "$SS_TC_ROOT/logs/execute/cmud__early_kill_OxGbTMix6L.sh.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/logs/execute/cmud__early_kill_OxGbTMix6L.sh.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_SBEhDmuFN9gj1mqjNAA7 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (file_handles_error_kcniEAglPK) AND NOT timeout_NIGgENzyzq) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((file_handles_error_kcniEAglPK) OR timeout_NIGgENzyzq OR controlled_exit_OkZLDbtxgk)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (file_handles_error_kcniEAglPK) AND NOT timeout_NIGgENzyzq) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((file_handles_error_kcniEAglPK) OR timeout_NIGgENzyzq OR controlled_exit_OkZLDbtxgk))
